name: Cinnamon Rock Candy
steps: Line a 15-inch by 10-inch by 1-inch pan with foil.
Butter the foil and set aside.
In a large heavy saucepan, combine water, sugar, corn syrup and food coloring.
Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally.
Cover and cook for 3 minutes to dissolve sugar crystals.
Uncover; cook on medium-high heat, without stirring, until a candy thermometer reads 300Â°. This takes about 25 minutes.
Stir in cinnamon oil. Keep face away from mixture as oil is very strong.
Break the candy into pieces using the edge of a metal mallet.
Sprinkle both sides of candy with confectioners' sugar.
